trans-unit.source: Testing a Driver
trans-unit.target: Testing a Driver

trans-unit.source: The WDK adds a driver testing interface to Visual Studio that allows you to conveniently build, deploy, install, and test a driver on a remote test computer on your network.
trans-unit.target: The WDK adds a driver testing interface to Visual Studio that allows you to conveniently build, deploy, install, and test a driver on a remote test computer on your network.

trans-unit.source: The WDK also provides a collection of device driver tests that you can use to test features and functions of your driver.
trans-unit.target: The WDK also provides a collection of device driver tests that you can use to test features and functions of your driver.

trans-unit.source: You can also write customize or write your own driver tests using the Driver Test Template in Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: You can also write customize or write your own driver tests using the Driver Test Template in Visual Studio.

trans-unit.source: Video Demonstration
trans-unit.target: Video Demonstration

trans-unit.source: This video demonstrates the how to run driver-related tests in a test group.
trans-unit.target: This video demonstrates the how to run driver-related tests in a test group.

trans-unit.source: This section describes some strategies for testing driver, and information about how you select and configure a remote computer to use for testing.
trans-unit.target: This section describes some strategies for testing driver, and information about how you select and configure a remote computer to use for testing.

trans-unit.source: To prepare a driver for public distribution, you should run the [Windows Hardware Certification Kit (HCK)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=254893).
trans-unit.target: To prepare a driver for public distribution, you should run the [Windows Hardware Certification Kit (HCK)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=254893).

trans-unit.source: For information about the Windows Certification program and how to obtain the HCK, see [Windows Hardware Certification Program](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=227016).
trans-unit.target: For information about the Windows Certification program and how to obtain the HCK, see [Windows Hardware Certification Program](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=227016).

trans-unit.source: In this section
trans-unit.target: In this section

trans-unit.source: Topic
trans-unit.target: Topic

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Tips for testing drivers during development
trans-unit.target: Tips for testing drivers during development

trans-unit.source: When should you start testing?
trans-unit.target: When should you start testing?

trans-unit.source: As soon as you have the requirements for your driver, you can begin to design test cases to test that the critical requirements have been implemented.
trans-unit.target: As soon as you have the requirements for your driver, you can begin to design test cases to test that the critical requirements have been implemented.

trans-unit.source: Studies show that finding and fixing defects in code becomes more expensive the longer the defects remain in the code.
trans-unit.target: Studies show that finding and fixing defects in code becomes more expensive the longer the defects remain in the code.

trans-unit.source: Finding and fixing defects early in the development cycle is less costly and disruptive than finding defects after the code has been released and distributed.
trans-unit.target: Finding and fixing defects early in the development cycle is less costly and disruptive than finding defects after the code has been released and distributed.

trans-unit.source: Creating your test cases early can also help you find problems in your design.
trans-unit.target: Creating your test cases early can also help you find problems in your design.

trans-unit.source: How to test a driver at runtime using Visual Studio
trans-unit.target: How to test a driver at runtime using Visual Studio

trans-unit.source: The WDK extensions to Visual Studio provide a device testing interface that enables you to conveniently build, deploy, install, and test a driver on a test computer on your network.
trans-unit.target: The WDK extensions to Visual Studio provide a device testing interface that enables you to conveniently build, deploy, install, and test a driver on a test computer on your network.

trans-unit.source: The WDK provides a collection of device driver tests that you can use to test the features and functions of your driver.
trans-unit.target: The WDK provides a collection of device driver tests that you can use to test the features and functions of your driver.

trans-unit.source: How to write a driver test using a Driver Test template
trans-unit.target: How to write a driver test using a Driver Test template

trans-unit.source: You can use the Windows Driver Kit (WDK) for Windows 8 to create your own driver tests or to customize some of the tests that are provided.
trans-unit.target: You can use the Windows Driver Kit (WDK) for Windows 8 to create your own driver tests or to customize some of the tests that are provided.

trans-unit.source: You can deploy the tests that you create to remote test computers using the driver testing framework that the WDK provides for Microsoft Visual Studio Ultimate 2012.
trans-unit.target: You can deploy the tests that you create to remote test computers using the driver testing framework that the WDK provides for Microsoft Visual Studio Ultimate 2012.
